comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body: Which version of PowerShell are you using? I can't reproduce this on `v7.1.3`.  What is the output of `$PSVersionTable`?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @krishnayalavarthi The issue doesn't describe the problem, and it doesn't have repro steps and environment data. Hence, I will close this issue. Please following the issue template to provide all needed information when you open a new issue, thanks!

title: The context menu item "Open PowerShell window here" to remove the set-executionpolicy
